TtaSwitchButton 
 public static native void TtaSwitchButton(int document,
                                           int view,
                                           int index)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaSwitchButton Change the status of the button entry in a document view. This function must specify a valid view of a valid document. Parameters: document: the concerned document. view: the concerned view. index: the index. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaChangeButton 
 public static native void TtaChangeButton(int document,
                                           int view,
                                           int index,
                                           long picture)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaChangeButton Change the button entry in a document view. This function must specify a valid view of a valid document. Parameters: document: the concerned document. view: the concerned view. index: the index. picture: the new icon. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

Parameters: document: identifier of the document. view: identifier of the view. index: ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaCreateBitmapLogo 
 public static native long TtaCreateBitmapLogo(int width,
                                               int height,
                                               String bits)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaCreateBitmapLogo Creates a logo pixmap from a bitmap description: width, height and bit array. Parameters: width: the width value of the bitmap. height: the height value of the bitmap. bits: the bit array. Return value: The created pixmap for the logo. ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaRegisterPixmap 
 public static native void TtaRegisterPixmap(String name,
                                             long pix)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaRegisterPixmap Register a pre-loaded Pixmap into the database. Parameters: name : the name of the image. pix : pointer to the existing pixmap. Return value: none ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaLoadImage 
 public static native long TtaLoadImage(String name,
                                        String path)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaLoadImage Load an image from disk into the database. Parameters: name : the name of the image. path : the full pathname referencing the image file. Return value: The created pixmap ----------------------------------------------------------------------

TtaGetImage 
 public static native long TtaGetImage(String name)
---------------------------------------------------------------------- TtaGetImage Get an image from the database. Parameters: name : the name of the image. Return value: The pixmap or NULL if not found. ----------------------------------------------------------------------
